Please read the following terms and conditions carefully.
Customers use of any of Company services indicates an agreement to be bound by the terms and conditions set forth below.Items which are given to the company for cleaning/repairing will termed as article in this agreement.This agreement is strictly beteween company and customer and does not in any way constitute or imply any relationship with any other parties. 1. Company will use reasonable efforts to try to ensure that washing,drying and folding services are maintained at a high level of quality. 2. Customers are requested to examine the articles at the time of delivery; we would not be held responsible for any damages that are found after delivery of processed articles. 3. Urgent delivery of articles would be charged 50% extra over the regular tariff. 5. If not satisfied with the quality of any service offered,customers should get in touch with the company within 24 hours for resolution. 4. We are not responible for fastness, colour bleeed, colour running, shrinkage, damages to establishments or embroidery work on the articles during processing. 6. Company reserves the right to refuse cleaning any garment. 7. Company accepts no liability for special care and delicate items that require special attention to be cleaned. 8. For a better experience,while using our Service, we may require you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information,including your current location,Internet and Network state.
1. Go to our laundry app and schedule your wash as per your convenience. We will take it from there. Hassel free, fast and simple! 2.
